reviewText: Kunoichi films are a staple of Japanese B-movies. This is a particularly poor example. The action sequences are woeful and the acting is not much better. This soon descends into some weak porn sequences. Best avoided on all fronts.
LOVE THE MOIVE ASIANCI NMEA AT ITS BEST

Great DVD that was direct to content and was as expected.  The shipping on time, previous reviews just and unbiased.  Price per item always a plus and reasonable.  Quality of viewing content unflawed.

If you purchase this movie take it with a grain of salt and remember what it is, it was actually quite silly and funny at it's best downright stupid at times and raunchy as well a Pink Movie, good for late night entertainment or crazy drunken parties with the right people.

I order some DVDs and calendars from CDJapan in Tokyo, so I have some pinup girl DVDs of Risa Koda and other Nipponese sexpots. I have several movies about "Kunoichi" (Lady Ninja), and my favorites are 1) Miyuki Komatsu in "Kunoichi Ninpo Cho 3" and 2) Risa Koda in this one. Neon Kanda also stars as Risa's friend and fellow ninjustsu student. This movie has both action and sexy scenes, so it's a winner in my book. There's even a duel between a samurai and a ninja-the girl's sensei who comes to rescue them from the samurai. In case someone knows little about Japan, I'll say Samurai were noble Bushi warriors and Ninja were low class Hinin warriors. Covergirl Risa is high class in sexiness though.

First of all, if your looking for an action packed, martial arts movie...well, you are not going to find it in this movie. This movie is very erotic with lots of nudity. THis is the kind of movie that you don't need to take it seriously. So, if your looking for cute, hot, sexy japanese girl then this movie is for you. I gave it four stars for sexiness and cuteness of the two female ninjas in this movie. Buy this movie now. I highly recommend this. also buy Naked Sword (Ninjaken). I want to see more movies like this from switchblade pictures.
